data.title: Good Food
data.text: The food is very good but very pricy!  I'm not a fan of being set inches from the next table as I don't really need to hear their conversation.  Noise level is high during peak time.  I enjoy but off peak hours and occasional visit doesn't hurt the pocket book.

data.title: Soccer team dinner!
data.text: This place is awesome! The pizza is so good you just want to eat and eat and eat! Restaurant did a superb job handling and taking care of 35 of us for a soccer team dinner event. Host\hostesses and managerial staff was wonderful to work with. If you are in the area, definitely make this a stop.

data.title: Never fails us
data.text: We visit Scottsdale on business often and Grimaldi's is the only place we always go to eat on every visit. By far THE best pizza with an exceptional tiramisu if you can squeeze it in. Great staff and a grandstand  view of your pizza being made. Love it there every time... Be back soon .

data.title: Good food for casual business dinner
data.text:
Eight people for dinner after a conference. 

Service was friendly and efficient. 

We ordered three pizzas and salad, family style + wine and beer. Good available selections. 

The food and drinks were good, served fast, and the price was reasonable. 

I would recommend this restaurant.

data.title: Not disappointed
data.text: Pizza was as good as I remembered. Very comfortable place with good food. Glad to see they are in Kierland.

data.title: Enjoyable
data.text: The staff were super nice the small size Mediterranean salad was perfect for two and tasted great. The pizza was pretty good. Would always order extra cheese if I went back as it was a bit dry.  It may also be too little sauce on red and also on pesto   Ranking brought up for the salad. Pizza more like a good rather than very good. However the . cappuccino was excellent

data.title: Best Pizza Ever -- Dessert to Die for
data.text: Long day on the road.  Husband wanted a pizza and a place with casual atmosphere. Grimaldi's more than fit the bill.  This was our first visit.  We were immediately greeting and shown to a table.  We ordered the 12" personal pizza with spinach and mushroom.  Outstanding and cooked to perfection.  We ordered the dessert sampler and selected the chocolate cheescake, apple caramel cheesecake and cannoli all of which were outstanding and perfectly balanced.  Brett provided impeccable service.  The atmosphere was great.  Loved this place and will make it a must stop when in Scottsdale.

data.title: Good Pizza
data.text: We come here when we go to Scottsdale and are looking for a good pizza.  Traditional Italian pies served in a typical pizzeria setting and/or courtyard.

data.title: Disappointed
data.text:
Read the reviews and I was in the mood for good old pizza. Service was good with an up beat atmosphere. 
I ordered a 12" Margarita pizza with pepperoni and fresh garlic. It was delivered in a good amount of time 
The special sauce had good flavor. The crust though was under cooked, the pepperoni seemed under cooked and did not have any flavor also the fresh garlic was pretty much still raw. 

I plan or returning and hopefully they can cook it an extra minute or two.

data.title: Decent Pizza
data.text:
Grimaldi's represents itself as offering "New York Style Pizza". I know NY pizza and, although it's thin-crusted, it is not NY pizza. However, the coal-fired oven pizza is decent enough and worth a try. Salad was quite good and portions are a good size. Even the small salad can be shared by two.

The restaurant is decorated with NYC subway signs and is meant to be a typical small Italian restaurant complete with the requisite red and white checkered tablecloths. There are dozens of very good beers available - both on tap and bottled. A full bar is also available.

It's not a quaint and quiet place. It can be busy, crowded and loud. Service was helpful and attentive.

data.title: "Not So Good Cold!"
data.text: I have been to Grimaldi's several times and have always enjoyed it. I guess some pizza is better straight from the oven than when you take it home and eat it there. I was going to have it at the bar, yes I know it was busy, but the pie took well over 30 minutes and I sort of got bored waiting at the bar and asked for it to take away. Drove home and, well it had turned to a cardboard like crust and wasn't as good as I had remembered having at the restaurant. Well my lose. Just writing this to anyone that orders these rather expensive pizzas and hope to get the same quality as when you dine in there restaurant. I certainly will not take it home again.

data.title: Pizza time!
data.text:
Found this restaurant during a walk through Scotsdale old town. Its a big noisy restaurant, but the pizza we got was perfect.
We took a medium size pizza, and added artishoke, pepperoni, italian sausace, black olives & sun dried tomato's.
Perfect crust and nice thin middle.
We had Blue Moon beer and shared a nice tiramisu desert.
The place was packed and a bit noisy but good atmosphere overall.

data.title: Wow!
data.text: This was one of the best pizzas we have ever had! We enjoyed "The Don". A pepperoni, sausage and meatball pizza - a nice sauce with a slight tang and a little heat. The mozzarella was perfection! The crust was thin and crisp. It is open for lunch and has parking available in the back. Outside courtyard is nice and has shade if you want it. When I return to Scottsdale I am stopping back here!

data.title: Grimaldi's is just really good pizza
data.text: Just like the shop in Denver, Grimaldi's really shines in their flavors, service, and atmosphere.  It is just consistently good, time after time.

data.title: Tasty pizza
data.text: Went to meet some friends also in town for the weekend and ordered some delicious pizzas. Staff were friendly, Michelle was on point for our entire visit. The pizzas are tasty and the nice taste of the charcoal from making them comes through. It is subtle but can be picked up in every bite. Fresh mozzarella is the key to this great pizza. They have a nice beer and wine selection and a good choice of salads too. Stop here and enjoy, the freshness of the pizza and the friendliness of the staff makes this a must stop.

data.title: LARGE SIZE SERVING OF PIZZA
data.text: We ordered the personal size pizza with ground beef....very tasty.  Size was huge with 6 big slices.  Save room for dessert....the Trio was very good with 3 different items.

data.title: Love this place
data.text:
The first time I ever had pizza from Grimaldis was in Vegas and every time I am back there I have to go. So imagine my surprise walking though baggage pick up in the Phoenix airport and I see their sign. Well that's were we went for lunch right after picking up the rental car. 

Pizza is true New York style crust has a nice crispness to it and I love how you can get ricotta cheese on the pizza. A lot of places don't do that. I plan to visit the Vegas location when I am there in December. 

This place is awesome.

data.title: Great Pizza
data.text: Just moved to the area. The pizza is delicious. Ordered a Caesar salad..really good. Ambiance great for a relaxing dinner with friends and family

data.title: Great atmosphere
data.text: Pizza was very good and the atmosphere was great as well.  Staff was very friendly and knowledgeable.

data.title: simply amazing!!
data.text:
I love this restaurant! It was our first time here and it was just perfect! The pizza and salads were very good and you can tell the ingredients and quality of the product is very fresh.
 The service was also very good and i appreciated that the manager went around checking on the tables.
